game_description: It's doomsday and only three hours are left to save Arkala town. The clock is ticking, the townsfolk are in distress, the townsfolk are lying. The townsfolk are lying ? Tomorrow ends take you in an old town far away from regular men where different rules apply. In tomorrow ends your main goal is to figure out what happened to that special book that kept the village safe for so many years. You have to stay alert and understand what the townsfolk are saying. You have to figure out who could have possibly done such a horrible act and doom the village. Emerge in this town, become its member and save the town.
review_1: This game requires alot of patience and critical thinking. You have to walk around and figure out all the clues from what the villagers are saying and find the items you need. Took me three weeks
review_2: if you like to walk, and i mean WALK, nonstop, then this is the game for you. very little to do, just walking around and around in circles. everything is very spaced out. you need an apple, walk 16 miles to get it, then walk 16 miles back. was it the right apple? we'll never know. just walk 16 miles back to get another one and 16 miles again. don't know where to go? just walk a million miles until you find another person to get a hint.
